data.what_is: Antevenio is a digital marketing firm that provides advertisement optimization and email marketing services.
data.product_description: Antevenio is a digital marketing firm that provides advertisement optimization and email marketing services.

initial_reviews.review_title: Straightforward way to access to publishers and influencers
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Antevenio?
Wide portfolio of websites, publishers and influencers for all budgets. The platform is very easy to use. Support, at least in Spain, is quite accessible and works fine.

What do you dislike about Antevenio?
At least from my experience, nothing special to mention. In the case of Coobis, maybe it's not the cheapest solution, but as the service "works", and counting on a reliable partner such as Antevenio (especially with small sites you can use for SEO that you don't really know much of them) is a good thing.

What problems is Antevenio solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Antevenio's Coobis platform you can access a wide portfolio of niche or wide-aimed digital publishers or influencers in order to define paid content collaborations. It's easy to manage and the process works fine. They have also other service for branded marketing, paid media, SEO...

initial_reviews.review_title: Eficiencia en la asignacion de presupuesto y en la optimizacion de la publicidad online
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Antevenio?
Ayuda a mejorar la experiencia del usuario y a aumentar la visibilidad y el alcance de sus campanas de marketing, lo que se traduce en un mayor retorno de inversion.

What do you dislike about Antevenio?
De momento no tengo ni he eschuchado nada negativo sobre la empresa

What problems is Antevenio solving and how is that benefiting you?
Esta solucionando problemas de eficiencia y efectividad en el marketing digital a traves de la implementacion de tecnologias avanzadas y la utilizacion de datos y analisis para informar las decisiones de marketing.

initial_reviews.review_title: Good & practical use of Antevenio's digital marketing has helped in our growth
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Antevenio?
The strategy and execution which helped in quick conversions

What do you dislike about Antevenio?
Nothing as such as of now, but more could be done on new segments related to this

What problems is Antevenio solving and how is that benefiting you?
Increase brand penetration, generating quality leads for organic sales growth and thus, the following flywheel effect

initial_reviews.review_title: help to improve communication with your clients by establishing a system of loyalty.
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Antevenio helped with:
it launches its videogames and electronic sports offering to provide a complete marketing solution for brands. help to improve communication with your clients by establishing a system of loyalty.

What do you like best about Antevenio?
it is a digital marketing firm that provides advertisement optimization and email marketing services. help to provide better features to the client, offer advertising and marketing service which is more feasible.

What do you dislike about Antevenio?
services are good except customer support in somewhere it is taking time to resolve the problem

Recommendations to others considering Antevenio:
it is good service provider to enhance the business by doing marketing, email and SMS services.

What problems is Antevenio solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sms and Email marketing help to improve the business , Digital video advertising help to improve the business.

initial_reviews.review_title: Go to site for improving sales leads
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Antevenio helped with:
Antevenio helped in one of my advertising and marketing projects. Their product is really helpful in providing solutions to get the work done successfully, be it a lead generation or sales conversion, or targetting an audience for better reach.

What do you like best about Antevenio?
The Search Engine Optimization service is the best in the industry as the returns on investment provided improved significantly after using their service. The CTRs improved also, the quality of lead generated was very good as per the business requirement.

What do you dislike about Antevenio?
Nothing much to dislike but web design and financial services have room to improve. They can make it a lot better than it is right now if they work on customer requirements.

What problems is Antevenio solving and how is that benefiting you?
Antevenio has become a go-to place for any branding or marketing requirements as it has helped in reaching the customers very efficiently which has improved as compared to the previous services used.  The ROI has worked in favor of us and also, customers and businesses both have benefitted from their service.

Describe the project or task Antevenio helped with:
It was supposed to be a digital media marketing for our company with right audience target, we took help from Antevenio

What do you like best about Antevenio?
They are well aware of the fact that to adapt to the constant changes in the industry, they must develop technologic solutions.

What do you dislike about Antevenio?
They haven't been able to be serious about ADV. They need to raise their game if they wish to sustain

Recommendations to others considering Antevenio:
You need to proactively work with them to ensure ur deliverables are on time.

What problems is Antevenio solving and how is that benefiting you?
Problems of reaching audience through digital marketing platform and advertising with SEO
